original_text: like servants waiting for their master to return from a wedding banquet, so that when he comes and knocks they can immediately open the door for him.
korean_text: 너희는 마치 그 주인이 혼인 집에서 돌아와 문을 두드리면 곧 열어 주려고 기다리는 사람과 같이 되라

sentences.original_text: like servants waiting for their master
to return from a wedding banquet
so that when he comes and knocks
they can immediately open the door for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 즉시 그를 위해 문을 열 수 있도록
